title: Randy
description: As the clan continues to move into modern times and more of the mermen are choosing to live on land, change is in the air. The brothers must work together to assure the future of their people, but change isn't always easy, and danger is closer than they think.Randy would do anything to protect the men in his clan and that is exactly what he is doing when he takes on a shark that attacks while training the newly transitioned mermen.Tevon is the clan's doctor and he prides himself on being the best, but when the king's brother is brought in after being attacked, it will put everything he knows to the test.Two men with lives that couldn't be more different are forced to work together as Randy recovers, trouble is, recovery might not mean all is as it once was.
author: E.M. Leya
